Thanks everyone for your input on this.  I have decided to just let him believe or not believe what he wants and not involve him in my research unless he shows an interest. I know I am talking to spirits on my radio and I have some great files some of which where done by members of this group which prove it. It is nice to know there is a good support group for us believers. 
   
  Kay

psfponies <psfponies@...> wrote:
  I have let my boyfriend listen to some of my files. He cant seem to 
hear anything. (He is a bit hard of hearing) he is saying what we are 
hearing is skip from a cb radio or skip in general. Any imput on this? 

Kay
